name: july
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A1 the seventh month of the year, after June and before August: The film festival is in July. My son's birthday is on 29 July. They're getting married next July.
More examplesFewer examplesWe usually go on holiday in July.My father died last July.Our next meeting will be on 3 July.
